item.potion_pill.potion_pill.name: %s Potion Pill
tooltip.potion_pill.medicinal_materials_: Used to store medicinal materials refined from the furnace.
tooltip.potion_pill.a_stack_of_potion_pi: Used to line beneath low-tier potion pills.
tooltip.potion_pill.refine_potion_pill_c: Special fabric designed for mid-tier and high-tier potion pills, effectively preserving advanced pills.
tooltip.potion_pill.bone_dust.text: Used to craft special elixirs for non-player entities; obtained by right-clicking an Alchemy Furnace with §fBone Meal§7 in the main hand and §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.extremely_potent_hol: §c[Extremely Potent Hot Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.moderately_potent_ho: §c[Moderately Potent Hot Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.mildly_potent_holt_m: §c[Mildly Potent Hot Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.extremely_potent_col: §b[Extremely Potent Cold Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.moderately_potent_co: §b[Moderately Potent Cold Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.mildly_potent_cold_m: §b[Mildly Potent Cold Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.extremely_potent_war: §e[Extremely Potent Warm Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.moderately_potent_wa: §e[Moderately Potent Warm Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.mildly_potent_warm_m: §e[Mildly Potent Warm Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.extremely_potent_coo: §e[Extremely Potent Cool Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.moderately_potent_co: §e[Moderately Potent Cool Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.mildly_potent_cool_m: §e[Mildly Potent Cool Medicinal Herbs]§7 Obtained randomly by right-clicking a Potion Refinery with flower items. Potency level and medicinal type are random.
tooltip.potion_pill.hyorogan.text: A compact food item that can fill your stomach, perfect for carrying on the go.
tooltip.potion_pill.exp_pill.text: Grants temporary Luck effect and increases experience gained when consumed.
tooltip.potion_pill.animal_power_pill.te: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eBeast Power§7 effect (up to 5 levels, 30s duration) that increases attack damage, max health, knockback resistance and knockback distance by §e10%%§7 per level.
tooltip.potion_pill.dragon_power_pill.te: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eDragon Power§7 effect (up to 5 levels, 30s duration) that increases all attack damage by §e10%%§7 per level.
tooltip.potion_pill.ward_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eVeinguard§7 effect (up to 5 levels, 30s duration) that reduces incoming damage by §e5%%§7 per level.
tooltip.potion_pill.ironhide_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eIronhide§7 effect (up to 5 levels, 30s duration) that reduces incoming damage by §e1§7 per level.
tooltip.potion_pill.copper_armor_pill.te: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eCopper Armor§7 effect (30s duration) that increases armor value by 3 and armor toughness.
tooltip.potion_pill.iron_armor_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eIron Armor§7 effect (30s duration) that increases armor value by 4 and armor toughness.
tooltip.potion_pill.diamond_armor_pill.t: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eDiamond Armor§7 effect (30s duration) that increases armor value by 5 and armor toughness.
tooltip.potion_pill.netherite_armor_pill: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eNetherite Armor§7 effect (30s duration) that increases armor value by 6, armor toughness and knockback resistance by 0.5.
tooltip.potion_pill.revival_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a 10-second Regeneration effect based on missing health (max 4 levels).
tooltip.potion_pill.boneforge_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Restores 15%% of max health; doubles healing amount if health is below 50%.
tooltip.potion_pill.chillheart_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eChillheart§7 state (1 minute duration). When taking fire damage, clears the state and grants 10 seconds of Fire Resistance.
tooltip.potion_pill.frostspirit_pill.tex: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eFrostspirit§7 state (1 minute duration) that grants immunity to fire damage.
tooltip.potion_pill.zephyr_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eZephyr§7 effect (1 minute duration) that increases movement speed by 50%%, but is removed when taking damage exceeding 25%% of max health.
tooltip.potion_pill.zenith_zephyr_pill.t: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eZenith Zephyr§7 effect (1 minute duration) that increases movement speed by 25%% and attack speed by 25%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.night_vision_pill.te: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a stackable §eNight Vision§7 effect (1 minute duration).
tooltip.potion_pill.revive_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a 1-minute §eRevive§7 effect that provides immunity to one death during its duration.
tooltip.potion_pill.undying_pill.text: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Grants a 30-second §eYin-Yang Reversal§7 effect that provides unlimited death immunity during its duration.
tooltip.potion_pill.health_up_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the target [Health Boost] effect: increases health, attack damage and attack speed by 2.5%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.bone_up_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the target [Bone Forge] effect: increases health, attack damage and attack speed by 5%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.body_up_pill.text: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the target [Purifying Marrow] effect: increases health, attack damage, attack speed by 10%% and knockback resistance by 0.1.
tooltip.potion_pill.strong_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the [Body Tempering] effect: increases all damage dealt by 5%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.attack_up_pill.text: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the [Forging Body] effect: increases all damage dealt by 10%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.power_up_pill.text: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the [Mystic Dragon] effect: increases all damage dealt by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.crystal_skin_pill.te: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Crystal Skin] effect: increases armor value by 1 and armor toughness by 1.
tooltip.potion_pill.shining_blood_pill.t: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Shining Blood] effect: increases armor value by 2 and armor toughness by 2.
tooltip.potion_pill.black_armor_pill.tex: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 10 uses). Grants the [Black Armor] effect: increases armor value and armor toughness by 10%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.light_body_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Light Body] effect: reduces fall damage by 20%% and increases movement speed by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.hold_breath_pill.tex: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Breath Control] effect: reduces suffocation and drowning damage by 20%% and increases swimming speed by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.astute_pill.text: §2[Low-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Keen] effect: increases attack speed by 10%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.thunder_resistance_p: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Thunder Tempering] effect: reduces lightning damage by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.lava_resistance_pill: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Lava Tempering] effect: reduces fire and lava damage by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.freeze_resistance_pi: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Frost Tempering] effect: reduces freezing damage by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.explosion_resistance: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Shock Tempering] effect: reduces explosion damage by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.arrow_resistance_pil: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Projectile Tempering] effect: reduces projectile damage by 20%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.void_resistance_pill: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 5 uses). Grants the [Void Forging] effect: reduces all damage by 10%%.
tooltip.potion_pill.nonplayer_revive_pil: §6[Mid-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 1 use). Grants the [Revival] effect: negates one death.
tooltip.potion_pill.nirvana_pill.text: §4[High-Tier Elixir]§7 Can only be used on non-player entities (max 9 uses). Grants the [Nirvana] effect: negates one death and grants the [Nirvana Rebirth] state for 3 seconds (grants damage immunity, but clears the effect when dealing damage).
tooltip.potion_pill.concentrated_dragon_: §c[High-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Essential material for High-Tier Elixirs. §fNo need to balance its medicinal properties when used as auxiliary material.§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fDragon Breath§7 on an Alchemy Furnace with a §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_beast.tex: §c[Low-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Obtained with 50%% chance by right-clicking §fCow/Sheep/Rabbit/Chicken/Pork§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_death.tex: §c[High-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Obtained with 50%% chance by right-clicking §fRotten Flesh§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_lava.text: §c[High-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Obtained with 20%% chance by right-clicking §fMagma Block§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.molten_netherite.tex: §c[Low-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking §fNetherite Ingot§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_blaze.tex: §c[Low-Potency Hot Herb]§7 Essential material for Mid-Tier Elixirs. §fNo need to balance its medicinal properties when used as auxiliary material.§7 Obtained by right-clicking §fBlaze Rod§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.frostspirit_water.te: §b[High-Potency Cold Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fBlue Ice§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_snow.text: §b[Low-Potency Cold Herb]§7 Obtained with 50%% chance by right-clicking a §fSnow Block§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_poison.te: §b[Cold Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking §fPoisonous Potato/Spider Eye§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.leaf_juice.text: §e[Low-Potency Cool Herb]§7 Obtained with 20%% chance by right-clicking §fLeaf Items§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.molten_iron.text: §e[Cool Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fIron Ingot§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.molten_copper.text: §e[Cool Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fCopper Ingot§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.molten_gold.text: §e[Cool Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fGold Ingot§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_diamond.t: §e[High-Potency Cool Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fDiamond§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
§e[High-Potency Cool Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fAmethyst Shard§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_life.text: §a[High-Potency Warm Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fGolden Apple or Glowing Melon§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.medicinal_essence_be: §a[Warm Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fNether Wart§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_nature.te: §a[Low-Potency Warm Herb]§7 Obtained with 50%% chance by right-clicking §fCarrot/Potato/Melon/Beetroot/Pumpkin§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.bottled_ender_dust.t: §a[Warm Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking a §fStatic Ender Pearl§7 on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
tooltip.potion_pill.essence_of_revive.te: §a[High-Potency Warm Herb]§7 Obtained by right-clicking §fTotem of Undying§7 (§f2 required§7) on an Alchemy Furnace, requires §fMedicinal Materials Bottle§7 in the off-hand.
patchouli.potion_pill.book.name: Alchemical Notes
patchouli.potion_pill.book.landing_text: A mysterious notebook left behind by an unknown person, containing extensive knowledge about potion brewing.
patchouli.potion_pill.book.categories.ph: Covers fundamental knowledge about crafting pills and elixirs, including material acquisition, medicinal properties, and basic theoretical concepts.
patchouli.potion_pill.book.entries.pharm: The elixirs recorded in this book $(bold)essentially$(reset) transform various substances from the world into $(bold)materials with pharmacological properties$(reset), which are then refined into special consumable items. $(br)To align with the rules of this world, the abilities of these elixirs mostly have $(bold)real-world counterparts$(reset). For example, the Iron Armor Pill temporarily grants the consumer the defensive properties of 'iron armor' through its pharmacological effects.

The materials in this world can inherently transform into what we call 'equipment' or 'tools'. Therefore, when the essences extracted from these materials through copper furnaces are used as primary ingredients for elixirs, their $(bold)properties$(reset) closely resemble those of the $(bold)original objects$(reset). $(br)To surpass these natural limitations and enhance their potential, $(bold)additional processing$(reset) of these extracts is required.
Pharmacology - Properties and Effects of Medicinal Materials

Medicinal materials for elixir crafting are obtained by refining items from this world using the $(bold)Alchemy Furnace$(reset). These materials are categorized by $(bold)properties$(reset) and $(bold)effects$(reset), divided into four natures: '$(bold)Hot, Cold, Cool, Warm$(reset)', and three potency levels: '$(bold)Common, Weak, Strong$(reset)'. $(br)Although alchemical techniques in this world are greatly simplified, proper $(bold)balancing of medicinal properties$(reset) is still essential for crafting. However, advanced elixirs are less affected by these considerations.

The four natures - Hot, Cold, Cool, and Warm - correspond to four $(bold)primary functions$(reset) of medicinal materials. $(br)Hot-natured materials are generally used to craft elixirs that $(bold)enhance personal attributes$(reset), while their counterpart, Cold-natured materials, are used to create elixirs that $(bold)improve defensive capabilities$(reset). An imbalance of either Hot or Cold properties can $(bold)diminish efficacy$(reset) or even $(bold)turn the elixir toxic$(reset), so $(bold)balancing these properties$(reset) is crucial. $(br)Cool and Warm materials are commonly used for restorative elixirs or as balancing agents in formulations (with matching potency levels).

Potency levels represent the 'quantity' of Hot, Cold, Cool, and Warm properties within a material. As a general guideline, $(bold)three Weak materials ≈ one Common material$(reset). However, this conversion is mainly for understanding formulations - most recipes cannot be directly substituted with multiple lower-potency materials.
Acquiring Medicinal Materials and Storing Elixirs

Medicinal materials are obtained by refining substances through the Alchemy Furnace, but players must hold a $(bold)Medicinal Materials Bottle$(reset) in their off-hand to collect the extracted essences. Additionally, special $(bold)Pill Papers or Pill Cloths$(reset) are required to preserve crafted elixirs.

Bone Dust refined from Bone Meal can be used to craft permanent enhancement pills specifically designed for non-player entities. To use these pills, the player must hold the pill in their off hand (with the main hand empty) while sneaking, then right-click on the target entity.
message.potion_pill.target_pill.usage_fa: This isn't meant for personal consumption...
message.potion_pill.target_pill.buff_lev: The target has reached their limit
